DOC.brief_summary: The usefulness of re-oxygenation after inhalation of 50% nitrous oxide and 50% oxygen premix (Kalinox 170 bar) during dental care is studied and the pollution resulting from administration of Kalinox is also investigated.
DOC.brief_title: Interest of Re-oxygenation After Inhalation of 50% Nitrous Oxide / 50% Oxygen Premix in Dental Cares
DOC.criteria: From 1 year old anxious or phobic patients very young children requiring selective dental cares mental deficient patients ASA 1 or ASA 2 patients ASA 3 or ASA 4 patients contraindication linked to the experimental product patients with mental disorder incompatible with the motory test patients that have received anxiolytic treatment less than 2 hours before the dental care
